scripts.electron-build:dev: concurrently --names BUILD-MAIN,BUILD-PRELOAD -c bgGreen,bgYellow "npm run build-main:dev" "npm run build-preload:dev"
scripts.electron-build:prod: concurrently --names BUILD-RENDERER,BUILD-MAIN,BUILD-PRELOAD -c bgMagenta,bgGreen,bgYellow "npm run build-renderer:prod" "npm run build-main:dev" "npm run build-preload:dev" && electron-builder --config electron-builder.json
scripts.electron-run:dev: npm run electron-build:dev && concurrently --names VITE,ELECTRON -c bgMagenta,bgCyan "vite --config vite-renderer.config.ts" "electron dist/main/main.js" --kill-others
